${ModID}:Photograph.NAME: Photograph
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL
Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL

${ModID}:foresightAttack.NAME: Foresight
${ModID}:foresightAttack.DESCRIPTION: Guess that the card drawn is an Attack.

${ModID}:foresightSkill.NAME: Foresight
${ModID}:foresightSkill.DESCRIPTION: Guess that the card drawn is an Skill.

${ModID}:foresightPower.NAME: Foresight
${ModID}:foresightPower.DESCRIPTION: Guess that the card drawn is an Power.

${ModID}:FlatteringReport.NAME: Flattering Report
${ModID}:FlatteringReport.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:massDeletionOption.NAME: Mass Deletion
${ModID}:massDeletionOption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:tingshaOption.NAME: Opening Wind's Advent
${ModID}:tingshaOption.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:bandagesOption.NAME: Opening Wind's Advent
${ModID}:bandagesOption.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:thePolaroid.NAME: The Polaroid
${ModID}:thePolaroid.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked and aren't ${ModID}:Evasive, gain !M! ${ModID}:Evasion.
${ModID}:thePolaroid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked and aren't ${ModID}:Evasive, gain !M! ${ModID}:Evasion. NL Gain [E] .

${ModID}:theNegative.NAME: The Negative
${ModID}:theNegative.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take damage, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E] .

${ModID}:EmptyThreat.NAME: EmptyThreat
${ModID}:EmptyThreat.DESCRIPTION: Force the enemy to defend if possible. NL If the enemy is already defending, deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:PlayfulTaunt.NAME: Playful Taunt
${ModID}:PlayfulTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Force the enemy to attack if possible.

${ModID}:PressRelease.NAME: Press Release
${ModID}:PressRelease.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Copy a *Photograph in your hand.

${ModID}:WidespreadPropaganda.NAME: Widespread Propaganda
${ModID}:WidespreadPropaganda.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a *Photograph would deal damage to a single target, deal that damage to ALL enemies instead.

${ModID}:DoctoredImage.NAME: Doctored Image
${ModID}:DoctoredImage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a *Photograph in your hand.
${ModID}:DoctoredImage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a *Photograph in your hand twice.

${ModID}:PhotographicDisposal.NAME: Photographic Disposal
${ModID}:PhotographicDisposal.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Draw !M! cards. NL If you would discard a *Photograph, Exhaust it instead, and gain !${ModID}:M! Strength.

${ModID}:Foresight.NAME: Foresight
${ModID}:Foresight.DESCRIPTION: Choose a type of card. NL Draw !${ModID}:M! card. NL If that card was that type, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
${ModID}:Preparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard up to !${ModID}:M! cards.

${ModID}:WhispersOfTheWind.NAME: Whispers Of The Wind
${ModID}:WhispersOfTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Discard a card at random.
${ModID}:WhispersOfTheWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:Opportunity.NAME: Opportunity
${ModID}:Opportunity.DESCRIPTION: Draw !${ModID}:M! card. If target intends to not attack this turn, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Photocopier.NAME: Photocopier
${ModID}:Photocopier.DESCRIPTION: Select a card in your deck. Add a copy of it to your deck. NL Fleeting.

${ModID}:GaleBullet.NAME: Gale Bullet
${ModID}:GaleBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL When discarded, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Persuade.NAME: Persuade
${ModID}:Persuade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Force target enemy not to attack if possible.

${ModID}:GustFan.NAME: Gust Fan
${ModID}:GustFan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL If target enemy intends to attack, draw !M! card.

${ModID}:ReporterInstinct.NAME: Reporter's Instinct
${ModID}:ReporterInstinct.DESCRIPTION: If target intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:AirCutter.NAME: Air Cutter
${ModID}:AirCutter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard !${ModID}:M! card.

${ModID}:SuddenOutburst.NAME: Sudden Outburst
${ModID}:SuddenOutburst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and ${ModID}:Snapshot a random enemy.
${ModID}:SuddenOutburst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and L ${ModID}:Snapshot+ a random enemy.

${ModID}:PeerlessWind.NAME: Peerless Wind
${ModID}:PeerlessWind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Adaptive: NL Draw !M! cards. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

${ModID}:HurricaneOfFreedom.NAME: Hurricane Of Freedom
${ModID}:HurricaneOfFreedom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Discard !M! card at random.
${ModID}:HurricaneOfFreedom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Discard !M! card.

${ModID}:Galeforce.NAME: Galeforce
${ModID}:Galeforce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal: NL Gain [E] . NL Draw !M! card.

${ModID}:BreezeOfReminiscience.NAME: Breeze Of Reminiscience
${ModID}:BreezeOfReminiscience.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a card from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:FranticSearch.NAME: Frantic Search
${ModID}:FranticSearch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Discard !M! cards at random.
${ModID}:FranticSearch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Discard !M! cards.

${ModID}:MassDeletion.NAME: Mass Deletion
${ModID}:MassDeletion.DESCRIPTION: Discard your Draw Pile. NL For each card discarded, NL ${ModID}:Adaptive: NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:WindsOfChange.NAME: Winds Of Change
${ModID}:WindsOfChange.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. NL Draw that many cards.
${ModID}:WindsOfChange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. NL Draw that many cards plus two.

${ModID}:DashingDomination.NAME: Dashing Domination
${ModID}:DashingDomination.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, draw !M! card. NL When discarded, draw !${ModID}:M! cards.
${ModID}:DashingDomination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, draw !M! card and gain [E] . NL When discarded, draw !${ModID}:M! cards.

${ModID}:ShootTheBullet.NAME: Shoot The Bullet
${ModID}:ShootTheBullet.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Snapshot NL Gain this *Snapshot at the start of next turn. NL If you take no damage this turn, double its effects.
${ModID}:ShootTheBullet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Snapshot+ NL Gain this *Snapshot at the start of next turn. NL If you take no damage this turn, double its effects.

${ModID}:InstantShotJournalist.NAME: Instant Shot Journalist
${ModID}:InstantShotJournalist.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, ${ModID}:Snapshot ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust this card.
${ModID}:InstantShotJournalist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When drawn, ${ModID}:Snapshot+ ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust this card.

${ModID}:SkywardSonnet.NAME: Skyward Sonnet
${ModID}:SkywardSonnet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !${ModID}:M! card.

${ModID}:CherishingBreeze.NAME: Cherishing Breeze
${ModID}:CherishingBreeze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard any number of cards. NL Gain [E] for each card discarded.

${ModID}:QuickReporting.NAME: Quick Reporting
${ModID}:QuickReporting.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Snapshot a random enemy.

${ModID}:FreezeFrame.NAME: Freeze Frame
${ModID}:FreezeFrame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Target enemy repeats the same move next turn.

${ModID}:Telescoping.NAME: Telescoping
${ModID}:Telescoping.DESCRIPTION: You may always see the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

${ModID}:ForseenReaction.NAME: Forseen Reaction
${ModID}:ForseenReaction.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to target enemy's intent. NL
${ModID}:ForseenReaction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to ALL incoming attack damage. NL

${ModID}:SplittingGale.NAME: Splitting Gale
${ModID}:SplittingGale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL You may discard !${ModID}:M! card. NL If you don't, reduce this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:AirSlash.NAME: Air Slash
${ModID}:AirSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL If you discarded a card this turn, gain [E] [E] . NL If you didn't, gain [E] .

${ModID}:AdverseWind.NAME: Adverse Wind
${ModID}:AdverseWind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL If you discarded a card this turn, gain [E] [E] . NL If you didn't, gain [E] .

${ModID}:Tailwind.NAME: Tailwind
${ModID}:Tailwind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Evasion at the end of each turn.

${ModID}:EvasiveManeuver.NAME: Evasive Maneuver
${ModID}:EvasiveManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If ${ModID}:Evasive: NL Gain [E] NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:DashingGrace.NAME: Dashing Grace
${ModID}:DashingGrace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Evasion. NL When discarded, NL Gain !${ModID}:M! ${ModID}:Evasion.

${ModID}:BlindingSpeed.NAME: Blinding Speed
${ModID}:BlindingSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you become ${ModID}:Evasive: NL This costs !M! this turn.

${ModID}:AutumnalFallWind.NAME: Autumnal Fall Wind
${ModID}:AutumnalFallWind.DESCRIPTION: When discarded, choose a card in your draw pile. NL Play the chosen card twice and exhaust it.
${ModID}:AutumnalFallWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When discarded, choose a card in your draw pile. NL Play the chosen card twice and exhaust it. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:OutburstingGust.NAME: Outbursting Gust
${ModID}:OutburstingGust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you discarded a card this turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:DeadlineDay.NAME: Deadline Day
${ModID}:DeadlineDay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw !${ModID}:M! cards. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:EvasiveForm.NAME: Evasive Form
${ModID}:EvasiveForm.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card, gain !M! ${ModID}:Evasion.

${ModID}:IllusoryDominance.NAME: Illusory Dominance
${ModID}:IllusoryDominance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Evasion NL Gain !${ModID}:M! Strength. NL Exhaustive 2

${ModID}:FlutteringFeyFan.NAME: Fluttering Fey Fan
${ModID}:FlutteringFeyFan.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 Less [E] for each card discarded this turn. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

${ModID}:LibraryResearch.NAME: Library Research
${ModID}:LibraryResearch.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.

${ModID}:ExclusiveScoop.NAME: Exclusive Scoop
${ModID}:ExclusiveScoop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each *Photograph played this turn.

${ModID}:GuidingBreeze.NAME: Guiding Breeze
${ModID}:GuidingBreeze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL  If you played a *Photograph this turn, NL Draw !M! card.

${ModID}:SpiralingTempest.NAME: Spiraling Tempest
${ModID}:SpiralingTempest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When discarded, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:HighlightReel.NAME: Highlight Reel
${ModID}:HighlightReel.DESCRIPTION: Discard !${ModID}:M! card. NL Choose !M! cards in your draw pile. NL Play all of them.

${ModID}:IntertwinedWinds.NAME: Intertwined Winds
${ModID}:IntertwinedWinds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile. NL When discarded, put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:PhotoAlbum.NAME: Photo Album
${ModID}:PhotoAlbum.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !${ModID}:M! times. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each *Photograph played this turn.

${ModID}:OpeningWindAdvent.NAME: Opening Wind's Advent
${ModID}:OpeningWindAdvent.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Adaptive: NL Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:WindSickleVeiling.NAME: Wind Sickle Veiling
${ModID}:WindSickleVeiling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals damage an additional time for each card you discarded this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Deals damage an additional time for each card you discarded this turn.

${ModID}:RapidEnhancement.NAME: Rapid Enhancement
${ModID}:RapidEnhancement.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade all *Photographs in your hand.

${ModID}:Plagiarism.NAME: Plagiarism
${ModID}:Plagiarism.DESCRIPTION: Choose any non-colourless card of cost X+1 or lower. NL Play that card.
${ModID}:Plagiarism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose any *Upgraded non-colourless card of cost X+1 or lower. NL Play that card.

${ModID}:ClangingWindchime.NAME: Clanging Windchime
${ModID}:ClangingWindchime.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is discarded: NL Gain [E] . NL Draw !M! cards.
${ModID}:ClangingWindchime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is discarded: NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:MountainProcession.NAME: Mountain's Procession
${ModID}:MountainProcession.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 Less [E] for each card discarded this turn. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BunbunmaruNewspaper.NAME: Bunbunmaru Newspaper
${ModID}:BunbunmaruNewspaper.DESCRIPTION: Select !M! cards in your hand consisting of !${ModID}:M! cards and a *Photograph. NL  Attach those cards to this card, and change this card's effect.

${ModID}:OverclockedCamera.NAME: Overclocked Camera
${ModID}:OverclockedCamera.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL *Photographs deal double damage this turn. NL Lose [E] [E] . next turn.

${ModID}:GatherEvidence.NAME: Gather Evidence
${ModID}:GatherEvidence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, ${ModID}:Snapshot the attacker.

${ModID}:InvertedColours.NAME: Inverted Colours
${ModID}:InvertedColours.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Photograph in your hand. NL Gain Block equal to its damage. NL Deal damage to a random enemy equal to its Block.
